------Part 1------
square root of 2 is 1.4142135623731
2 to the power of 1/5 is 1.14869835499704
E**PI is 23.1406926327793
Pow(PI, E) is 22.459157718361
------Part 2 and 3------
Here we print gamma function for x equal to 1, 2, 3 and 10
40309.3949561941
40309.3949561941
40310.0881033747
362879.997652016
lngamma is plotted with same x-values
0.000263010984419895
0.000263010984419895
0.000526021968839789
12.8018274736111
